alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 3:09AM MST until December 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches with locally heavier accumulations possible. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Sheridan Foothills. In Montana, Southern Big Horn and Bighorn Canyon. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Snow and blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility at times. Treacherous travel conditions are expected this morning, including I-90 south of Crow Agency through Sheridan County.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings
